reviews.review_msg: Bob made this class really fun and inspiring. As an elective, with no prior knowledge of magazine publishing, this class was extremely easy to understand. This class is not difficult at all as long you don't procrastinate the group project. It's a pretty fun and easy class in terms of workload and difficulty level.
Bob is a great prof. Hilarious and interesting to listen to. This class was really practical and the group project was fun. Don't need to buy the textbook, just go to class.
Fun class, a lot of work but great experience working in groups.

He can be kind of a smart ass sometimes but humorous as well.  The guidelines and expectations of the whole group project you do are not very clear.  This whole course is group work and if you dont get a good group your screwed.
After graduation I work in a newspaper company, and find out the things that Bob teached me are quite useful. Gave me a concept what a newspaper/magazine firm is like.

This prof is lazy.  He showed 2 videos and had 3 classes of speakers.  With 2 in class exams, there are only 6 lectures that he needs to prepare for.  It's a good course to pull up your grades.  Nothing really learned.
His class require a lot of group meeting, group presentation etc..lots of group work, but it's not hard at all..He is funny sometimes...must go to tutorial...

I appreciate the idea and the structure of the course.  However, the instructor's attitude, teaching ability, and lack of interest in communication with the students have rubbed off on many students in the same class I know (including me).  I have to admit, it is an easy course if you don't care about having him as an instructor.

this course requires a lot of group work so pray you get a good group (60% of your mark). the course is challenging and lots of fun. bob's criticism is ment to prepare and strengthen your magazine concept. its all constructive critisim.

An easy class but his attitude makes him a chore to deal with. Unresponsive to suggestions and dishes out blunt criticism like you wouldn't believe. I got an A but really learned nothing in the class, and was not encouraged to be creative. Quite condescending and negative at times.

Yes, he's easy and yes, some ppl get by the course w/o doing much because there are 9 other ppl in your project group.  Just make sure u're not the one doing everybody else's work, then u'll be fine for this course
He is a very nice and FUNNY guy.   helpful and great feedback from him.  exams are fairly easy since only worth like 15%???  good course good prof!!!
No Comments
Good Professor
Easiest course in my life. Have no idea what is going on until the last day of class, but still end up with an A.
Very easy course! He drills you on your magazine topic though...be prepared.
Bob is a great guy...more than a just a prof, like a friend.  I would invite him to any of my parites!!!

The easiest course in SFU I did nothing and I still get an A- .... The lecture is completely useless I never went to class just get ur friend to get those lecture notes...from the 4 past exams that I looked at he based his questions mostly on the notes
Interesting guy...goes off topic, but good stories
He's been teaching the course for so damn long he forgets whether or not he's taught us stuff!!
He is a picky guy
